TopicTitle: RealPlume- Plume is there when the engines are off.

Articles.Content: Hi, I am running a heavily modded install that is pretty much RO but without FAR and some of the part mods. I have noticed that my engines, even when on a different stage, have running plume effects. No matter if I throttle down or up, or if the engines are shut down. the actual thrust behaves like normal, however.
